title: If `PartyGovernanceNFT.sol#increaseVotingPower()` is called for particular user, he will end up with an unfair/more amount of ethers after `PartyGovernanceNFT.sol#rageQuit()` function execution. This will also lead to a state where `PartyGovernanceNFT` contract does not have enough balance for the last users calling `PartyGovernanceNFT.sol#rageQuit()`.
